comments.body: Add a comment above the `license_file` line that includes a link to the following PR (https://github.com/InsightLab/PyMove/pull/66), which would, if merged, allow you to remove the manually packaged copy of the license file and use one that comes in the source distribution. The comment is meant as a reminder to check for this change in future updates to the feedstock.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +56,60 @@  license_family: MIT
  # https://github.com/InsightLab/PyMove/pull/66
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: "A lib python to processing and visualization of trajectories and other spatial-temporal data"
  doc_url:

comments.body:
I believe this package can be made `noarch: python`. See:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html#noarch-python

In that case, change `python` to `python >=3.5` under `host` and `run`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  noarch: python
